CustomField.formula:
RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EmployerAgreement' && TODAY() >= ADDMONTHS( TAG_EndDate__c, -2 ) && NOT( TAG_No_renewal_end_at_expiration__c) && NOT(ISBLANK( TAG_InternalContact__c )) && ISPICKVAL( TAG_Status__c , 'Godkjent') && OR( ISPICKVAL( TAG_Category__c , 'Strategisk partneravtale'), ISPICKVAL( TAG_Category__c , 'Markedssamarbeid'), ISPICKVAL( TAG_Category__c , 'Rekrutteringsavtale'), ISPICKVAL( TAG_Category__c , 'IA-avtale'), ISPICKVAL( TAG_Category__c , 'Inkluderingsavtale (Arbeidsgiver)')
)
CustomField.label: Expiration Reminder
